value.title: Set up Query Parameters to avoid hardcoded paths
value.excerpt: With the release of the April update (2016), Power Bi allows the use of parameters and in this video I will show you how to configure them to avoid using hardcoded paths when connecting to file sources in your computer. value.excerpt: Welcome to Wed with the DAX series. Today I’m going to explain one DAX function in Power BI which is – DISTINCTCOUNTNOBLANK()   When we use the DISTICTCOUNT() function in Power BI this will calculate distinct count for the column. This will also include Blank as a distinct record. As a result due to
